name: Squarewood Farm
description:
Welcome to Squarewood Farm! Here in this quaint country town, you have just become the proud new owner of a giant, square field. Can you master the craft of square-farming and ensure yourself a bountiful, quadrangular harvest?

To harvest crops, plant blocks of seeds to fill rows, or 3x3 squares. Forming multiple rows or squares simultaneously will give you perfect crops! This addictive and satisfying block placement gameplay is easy to learn, but has plenty of room for mastery for the dedicated square farmer.

Key Features
  • Unlock a variety of seeds with distinct block shapes, difficulties and rewards. Find the perfect crop to match your playstyle.
  • Spend your hard-earned money constructing buildings for your farm. Watch your cozy farm grow over time.
  • Take breaks from farming by visiting the nearby Squarewood Town. Befriend the local villagers, each with their own unique personalities and backstories.
  • Acquire useful quirks and tricks by purchasing tools that help make farming the field easier.
  • Animals! Animals need fenced areas to feed, but provide you with profitable animal products instead of crops.
